channel.title: Data Science on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on My New Hugo Site

item.title: data science vs statistics talk at the RSS
item.description: Tonight I attend a debate held at the Royal Statistics Society. It was en entertaining, and wide ranging discussion with a great panel, and fairly intelligent questions from the floor. Two fun facts: One of the founding members of the society was Charles Babbage The society is located within spitting distance of the grave of William Thomas Bayes So, here are the notes, rough and ready, and I missed a lot in my note taking, but I hope I get a flavour of the discussion across.
